Package org.hibernate.boot.model.source.spi

Interface ColumnSource

All Superinterfaces:
RelationalValueSource
public interface ColumnSource extends RelationalValueSource
Contract for source information pertaining to a physical column definition specific to a particular attribute context.

Conceptual note: this really describes a column from the perspective of its binding to an attribute, not necessarily the column itself.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Obtain the name of the column.
      Returns:
      The name of the column. Can be null, in which case a naming strategy is applied.

      Is this column nullable?
      Returns:
      true indicates it is nullable; false non-nullable.
